author: Kaitlyn Folmer, Dr. Mark Abdelmalek, Josh Margolin
title: Hospitals trying to figure out how to ration ventilators...
description: Hospitals trying to figure out how to ration ventilators... (Top headline, 2nd story, link ) Related stories: Biden Slams Trump 'Failure'... Florida Spring Breakers Begin Testing Positive... New York coronavirus cases surge 38% overnight to 20,875... Faces Ch…
content:
Faced with more critically ill COVID-19 patients than equipment to treat them, New York hospitals are mapping out how they can ration care and equipment in order to save the greatest number of patients possible.
